description: This file defines React components for rendering and interacting with a tic-tac-toe game board, including 'Board' and 'Cell' components, handling user interactions, styling, and accessibility features.

methods.name: classNames
methods.description: Utility function for concatenating class names conditionally.

methods.name: Cell
methods.description: React component representing a single cell in the tic-tac-toe grid.

methods.name: Board
methods.description: React component rendering the tic-tac-toe grid with accessibility and styling.
